topics.body:
"@Carcass Strife":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5557e02c63687208553b0300#post_5557e02c63687208553b0300
Basically a "input your account info so I can get you cool stuff" and I didn't know any better :P

Looking back, a lot of that even slightly uncommon stuff took ungodly amounts of effort to get, so I'm glad I'm not still playing, I'd still only have like 8 or 9 rare things even if I was still playing today. God help you if you didn't have any connections to any super dedicated players.
